summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Agent Builder platform UI redesign focusing on dark sidebar + light content theme consistency and navigation. All backend APIs are functioning perfectly (100% success rate) and the UI theme implementation is working correctly across all pages.
passed_tests: Backend API health check (GET /api/health) - 100% success
All agent CRUD operations (POST/GET/PUT/DELETE /api/agents)
Built-in tools endpoint (GET /api/tools/builtin) - 9 tools loaded
Integration categories (GET /api/integrations/categories) - 14 categories
Knowledge base CRUD operations (POST/GET/DELETE /api/knowledge)
Analytics dashboard (GET /api/analytics/calls)
LLM chat integration (POST /api/chat) - Working with OpenAI GPT-4o
Agent deployment (POST /api/agents/{id}/deploy)
UI Theme Consistency: Dark sidebar with gradient background
UI Theme Consistency: Light content area with proper contrast
Navigation: Dashboard page loads with stats cards and agent list
Navigation: Agents page loads with search and filter buttons
Navigation: Tools page loads with built-in tools and integration tabs
Navigation: Knowledge page loads with create knowledge base functionality
Navigation: Analytics page loads with charts and insights
Navigation: Settings page loads with profile, API keys, notifications, billing tabs
Create Agent modal opens with Chat/Voice/Multi-modal tabs
Create Agent modal form has all required fields (name, description, system prompt)
Sidebar toggle functionality (collapse/expand)
Tools page tabs functionality (All Tools, Built-in, Integrations, Custom)
Tools page search functionality
Integration categories display (CRM, Calendar with Connect buttons)
No JavaScript console errors detected

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All UI components, navigation, and theme working)
